title: New: Nguzunguzu – Delirium
content:
LA’s Nguzunguzu have dropped a cut from their new EP, Warm Pulse, which is out 3 July.

In a way it’s a detachment from their former material, perhaps less hell-bent and screwed than before, Delerium instead has its eye on the club rather than the caverns of the ear. That’s not to say it’s not a treat, because it is. A maddening loops slowly seeps into the skull, with moans and wails giving the piece humanistic moments of clarity at certain moment. And regardless, what the fuck’s wrong with a club banger eh?
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
